11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_NETEQ_NORMAL_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_NETEQ_NORMAL_H_
13
14#include <stdint.h>
15#include <string.h> // Access to size_t.
16
17#include "api/neteq/neteq.h"
18#include "modules/audio_coding/neteq/statistics_calculator.h"
19#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
20#include "rtc_base/constructor_magic.h"
21#include "rtc_base/numerics/safe_conversions.h"
22
23namespace webrtc {
24
25// Forward declarations.
26class AudioMultiVector;
27class BackgroundNoise;
28class DecoderDatabase;
29class Expand;
30
31// This class provides the "Normal" DSP operation, that is performed when
32// there is no data loss, no need to stretch the timing of the signal, and
33// no other "special circumstances" are at hand.
34class Normal {
35 public:
36 Normal(int fs_hz,
37 DecoderDatabase* decoder_database,
38 const BackgroundNoise& background_noise,
39 Expand* expand,
40 StatisticsCalculator* statistics)
41 : fs_hz_(fs_hz),
42 decoder_database_(decoder_database),
43 background_noise_(background_noise),
44 expand_(expand),
45 samples_per_ms_(rtc::CheckedDivExact(fs_hz_, 1000)),
46 default_win_slope_Q14_(
47 rtc::dchecked_cast<uint16_t>((1 << 14) / samples_per_ms_)),
48 statistics_(statistics) {}
49
50 virtual ~Normal() {}
51
52 // Performs the "Normal" operation. The decoder data is supplied in |input|,
53 // having |length| samples in total for all channels (interleaved). The
54 // result is written to |output|. The number of channels allocated in
55 // |output| defines the number of channels that will be used when
56 // de-interleaving |input|. |last_mode| contains the mode used in the previous
57 // GetAudio call (i.e., not the current one).
58 int Process(const int16_t* input,
59 size_t length,
60 NetEq::Mode last_mode,
61 AudioMultiVector* output);
62
63 private:
64 int fs_hz_;
65 DecoderDatabase* decoder_database_;
66 const BackgroundNoise& background_noise_;
67 Expand* expand_;
68 const size_t samples_per_ms_;
69 const int16_t default_win_slope_Q14_;
70 StatisticsCalculator* const statistics_;
71
72 RTC_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(Normal);
73};
74
75} // namespace webrtc
76#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_NETEQ_NORMAL_H_
77
